markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Courier](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=450)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 50 <sup>1.1</sup>

 

</column>

In your youth, you earned coin running messages for persons of wealth and influence, darting through crowded city streets. Your dogged commitment to deliver your message was good training for the life of an adventurer.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Intelligence, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) skill, and a [Lore](/skills/lore) skill for your city of origin. You gain the [Glean Contents](/Feats.aspx?ID=2129) skill feat.
name: Courier

text: Courier Source Player Core 2 pg. 50 1.1 In your youth, you earned coin running messages for persons of wealth and influence, darting through crowded city streets. Your dogged commitment to deliver your message was good training for the life of an adventurer. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Intelligence, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Society skill, and a Lore skill for your city of origin. You gain the Glean Contents skill feat.
